aboutParagraph1: Book space is the single most important European travel book space. This spacious store offers a selection of books, maps, conferences, coworking spaces and bar. Founded in 1996, 'Book space' is a store dedicated to all nature lovers, home of the largest natural history book collection in the world!
aboutParagraph2: In our book space there are many events and conferences. The most famous writers performed in our stage, presenting their new books.
aboutParagraph3: You can explore the most ancient bar in our city. The bar was founded in 1716 and includes drinks made with secret receipe of those times.
